about_the_game:
Smash Cup is a PvP & PvE arena brawler with a unique blend of multiple game genres, an ever-growing selection of upgradeable characters and supportive units.
This fast-paced, adrenaline-fueled action game has 1v1, 2v2, 3v3, tower defense and even battle royale mods, all to challenge new players in a highly competitive chase to become the ultimate smasher.



Each Smash Cup game is a test of strategy and quick thinking as you construct an impenetrable fortress. Use a variety of units for base building, each offering unique defensive and offensive capabilities. Choose carefully and optimize your base to withstand waves of relentless attacks.



Choose between joining forces with friends for intense 2v2, 3v3 battles, or going solo in 1v1 duels. Perfect your tactics, adapt to your opponents, and dominate the arena – together or alone.



With over eight playable characters boasting unique abilities, and more than 15 units for base building, you’ll upgrade your strategies. Every new character and unit brings you one step closer to becoming the ultimate Smasher.



From the strategic depth of Tower Defense to the adrenaline-fueled Battle Royale mode, there's a challenge for every type of player. Participate in daily tournaments, display your prowess, and reap grand prizes. Are you ready to take on the Smash Cup challenge?

Key Features

  • 8+ Playable characters with unique abilities that will determine your way of action.
  • 15+ Units for base building strategies to help you change the course of the game.
  • 3 MOBA modes to choose from intense 1v1, 2v2, and 3v3 multiplayer battles.
  • Tower defense to challenge your base building strategy.
  • Battle Royale mode that will test your ability to survive in an endless fight for victory.
  • Daily tournaments to win grand prizes, and stand out as the ultimate Smasher.
  • Upgrade your smashers and bases and advance further in the game.
  • Customize with new skins and arena themes to personalize your gaming experience.

Fresh Content Every Month

  • New game mechanics
  • New smashers and base units
  • Exclusive skins and rewards

Join the thrilling universe of Smash Cup today, where every Smasher is a star! We're constantly evolving and bringing fresh updates to the game regularly. Download now to start your journey!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • Processor: M1 pro or newer

  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760, AMD Radeon R7 270X, or better
